sentences.english: Women need to get out of damp sports bras quickly.
sentences.chinese: 女人们需要快速脱掉浸湿的运动胸罩。

sentences.english: The cake was wet; but they were hungry and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕浸湿了，但他们又饥又渴。

sentences.english: Wet your hands slightly first, to make it easier to shape the kofta.
sentences.chinese: 首先浸湿你的手会更易于塑型。

sentences.english: Moisten the tower with cold water and apply it to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 把毛巾用冷水浸湿，缚在伤口处。

sentences.english: Moisten the towel with cold water and apply it to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 把毛巾用冷水浸湿，缚在伤口处。

sentences.english: Soon tears had soaked all the fresh ink of my writing.
sentences.chinese: 很快就把我刚刚写上去的字迹都浸湿了。

sentences.english: Joe teacher clapped her hands, smiling back has been soaked sweat.
sentences.chinese: 乔师傅笑着拍拍手，后背已被汗水浸湿。

sentences.english: He soused a dog in the pond .

sentences.chinese: 军士长全身被汗浸湿透了。

sentences.english: Their scrubs and gowns grew dark with sweat.
sentences.chinese: 他们刷洗过的手臂和工作服都被汗水浸湿变暗了。

sentences.english: The beards of the young men glisten'd with wet, it ran from their long hair.
sentences.chinese: 青年们浸湿的胡子闪闪发光，水珠从长发上滴落。

sentences.english: He peeled off his blood-soaked shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他褪掉了血浸湿的衬衫。

sentences.english: In darkness, the thing with ropy what soaked his hand.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中，有什么粘稠的东西浸湿了他的手。

sentences.english: He was caught in the snowstorm, so that his clothes were soaked, He made his way home.
sentences.chinese: 他遭遇了暴风雪，结果他的衣服都浸湿了。

sentences.english: The rain made my quilt soppy.
sentences.chinese: 大雨把我的被子都浸湿了。

sentences.english: Wet skin, apply a small amount of QV Wash to the affected area.
sentences.chinese: 浸湿皮肤，使用少量浴液涂摸患病区域。

definition: to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
